product information:
Work comfortably for long hours with the ViewSonic VG2230WM monitor's ergonomic height adjustment and tilt. The Fast 5ms video response time of the ViewSonic LCD monitor allows you to enjoy blue-free images, full-motion video and crystal-clear graphics. Feast your eyes to high quality viewing with this 22-inch monitor's 1680 X 1050 resolution display. The multi-mode input technology of the ViewSonic LCD monitor supports both digital (DVI) and analog (VGA) signals, thereby providing you with maximum compatibility and configuration flexibility. Experience flawless videos and graphics with this 22-inch monitor's Dynamic Structure Technology. The ViewSonic VG2230WM consumes less energy thereby making it energy compliant.
